page.title: 11Health Services, Melchbourne
page.content: The doctor's surgery that serves Melchbourne is located at Sharnbrook, a large village four miles to the west There is no bus available to Sharnbrook, so people with no car have to rely upon friends and relatives to take them to the surgery. There is a dispensary attached to the surgery and if a repeat prescription is required the patient can send a postal request and the medicene can be collected from the dispensary. If hospital treatment is required, then people travel to Bedford General Hospital. Dentists and opticians are in either Bedford or Rushden.
